relation: food in la sierra university are fair. there is also cafe and vending machines around campus.
most of dormitories of la sierra university are located inside of the campus. amenities of dormitories are fairly good.
la sierra university has a strong health professional programs.
prospective students should come to la sierra university with open minded. there are plenty of resources available for students if they seek for them.

la sierra university has a small campus with a beautiful and serene environment. most of classes are kept in small numbers. therefore it is easy for students to keep in touch with their professors. the faculties of la sierra university are very friendly and caring for students.
